name: Galactic Gunner (itch)
description:
Galactic Gunner is a fast-paced, 2D top-down shooter game where you take on the role of a gunner  fighting against an Endless enemies. , you must battle through the enemies  to save humanity. 


 Game Feature

there is 2 enemies in this game, one enemy can shoot gun and the other cant.

 CONTROLS

just point ur cursor at the enemy to shoot him

press A to move left

Press D to move right

Press SpaceBar to jump or double jump
